metadata.Title: CVE-2017-2668 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
389-ds-base before versions 1.3.5.17 and 1.3.6.10 is vulnerable to an invalid pointer dereference in the way LDAP bind requests are handled. A remote unauthenticated attacker could use this flaw to make ns-slapd crash via a specially crafted LDAP bind request, resulting in denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-2668` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

389-ds - 1.3.7.10-1ubuntu1
389-ds-base - 1.3.7.10-1ubuntu1
389-ds-base-libs - 1.3.7.10-1ubuntu1
cockpit-389-ds - 1.3.7.10-1ubuntu1
python3-lib389 - 1.3.7.10-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.7.10-1ubuntu1').
